name: Little Briar Rose
description: Little Briar Rose is a very special, stained glass-styled adventure game inspired by the Sleeping Beauty fairy tale.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7/10 Processor: 1.8 Ghz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The game was short but quite lovely and really, really beautiful.
